channel.title: Changelog Feed
channel.description: Changes for each version of the software.

item.title: Version 1.108.45 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.45

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Header visibility issue fixed
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now identify the startup parameters when an SAP Fiori elements application is launched as an embedded application from My Inbox
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: Adjust worker initialization

item.title: Version 1.108.47 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.47

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageTitle: Fix flaky focus test in Safari
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now trigger a fetch call to load PDF content and determine PDF availability in the PDFViewer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimePicker: fix test about timezone failing in safari
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the iframe content check while loading a PDF to display it
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the iframe content check while loading a PDF to display it
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: has correct placeholder
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ComboBox: Picker now closes on table scroll
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnsController now works with the index from the table event
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/thirdparty: bump RequireJS to 2.3.7
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Calendar: fixed weekday announcement in multi-month setup
  • Library: sap.viz
    • Type: FIX, Description: Correct month and time calculation errors caused by numericFormatter

item.title: Version 1.108.35 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.35

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display the correct timestamp when exporting dateTime fields to the XLS file format
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Height calculations for scrollable contents are preserved after invalidation
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now updated the code to accommodate the changes related to the hostname in the response from the gateway
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enhanced the method for detecting data loss to support nested app routes in My Inbox scenarios
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enhanced the logic that allows access to the multiselection plug-in for the UI tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly retrieve the table and prepare paging information when switching between the subobject items
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer consider the URL parameter, save-appvar-id, when initiating the app
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: UoM in display mode in table is rendered with correct width for chinese
    • Type: FIX, Description: BaseController: Error is no longer thrown when data is extended
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/resource/ResourceModel#_handleLocalizationChange: wait for resource bundle to be loaded
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataListBinding: fire dataReceived event for aborted requests

item.title: Version 1.108.34 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.34

  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that back navigation from an object page to another application works correctly
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: Content padding classes are applied to the header if additional class is present
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MenuButton: buttons in split mode have separate tooltips
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ObjectNumber: remove roledescription announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Carousel: fix page disappearing when scrolling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ProgressIndicator: Visual misalignment of percent value fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Fiori20Adapter: Performance issue fixed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: adjust value help icon settings
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now retain the page variant correctly during external navigation
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enhanced the focus handling logic for non-draft apps
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: correct setting value of single filter field when there is validation request
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLabel: Restore connection to SmartField
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: ResourceModel: Fix bundle reload after localizationChange
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: PDF Export - Apply limit

item.title: Version 1.108.44 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.44

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the SAP gateway issues for PDFViewer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: has correct css parameters for active Emphasized
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where changes to added or removed filters were not correctly tracked in the iAppState when a variant was marked dirty
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: correct IsCalendarDate (Edm.String) initialization in negative timezones
    • Type: FIX, Description: ChartProvider: formatter for DateTimeOffset without UTC
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.RichTextEditor: Make qUnit tests version specific

item.title: Version 1.108.46 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.46

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: close picker on context change
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where changes made to the variant management-enabled table were lost during external navigation scenarios
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.export: Preserve patterns in template values

item.title: Version 1.108.48 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.108.48

  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: In the list report, focus handling for addCards functionality is now improved

item.title: Version 1.120.36 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.36

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: prevent animation when initially shown
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the duplicate application names displayed in the list of related apps
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: GroupElement is now hidden when there are no visible children
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Out parameters applied on initial binding
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: Adjust worker initialization
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.RichTextEditor: Make qUnit tests version specific

item.title: Version 1.120.38 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.38

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Header visibility issue fixed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ComboBox: Picker now closes on table scroll
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: add a view settings dialog items active announcement
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: exception when changing binding context
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataTreeBinding: $count requests must not contain $expand or $select
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.export: Preserve patterns in template values

item.title: Version 1.120.39 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.39

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Correct header repositioning in both directions
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageTitle: Fix flaky focus test in Safari
  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: Fixed shapes drag drop issue when row highlight is enabled in Gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the rendering error of gantt chart total horizon on larger screens
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Show footer after calling setShowFooter twice
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Add the browser event information to the UI5 event
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.p13n: integrate missing screen reader announcement for table filtering in SAP UI5 1.120
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the iframe content check while loading a PDF to display it
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now removed the iframe content check while loading a PDF to display it
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimePicker: fix test about timezone failing in safari
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: has correct placeholder
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: close picker on context change
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where application title and navigation were not consistent when object page was embedded in the My Inbox application
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ColumnsController now works with the index from the table event
    • Type: FIX, Description: Personalization/ColumnsController: column freeze is correctly preserved when comes from variant
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: Add Condition button now has correct text and ScreenReader announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: GroupElement's visibility property remains unchanged if its value is bound
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Prevent duplicate shortcut announcements in screen readers
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/thirdparty: bump RequireJS to 2.3.7
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: SemanticFormElement: _updateDisplayText does no longer fail without available _displayField
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Table: Remove renderWhitespace restriction
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: Table: Remove renderWhitespace restriction

item.title: Version 1.120.40 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.40

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: Store begin column width
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Add the browser event information to the UI5 event
    • Type: FIX, Description: VariantManagement: "expanded" not announced
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.PlanningCalendarHeader: add visible label to the view switch
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Default type is shown correctly in Info bar
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.Table: Focus on popin area should not scroll on the main row
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Remove redundant announcements from sort and group list items
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ComboBoxBase: Value state popup is now hidden when the picker is opened
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Page: Fix failing tests
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now trigger a fetch call to load PDF content and determine PDF availability in the PDFViewer
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer display the placeholder on the list report page when Apply Automatically is enabled for the variant but the required SmartFilterBar field contains invalid values
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where navigating back to the object page from a draft entity after activation using a determining action caused errors
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField handles TextArrangement DescriptionOnly correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterController: Selection from ValueHelp in single fields now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Improvement of UoM format handling
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: history values are now update from ValueHelpDialog
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.Table: Focus on popin area should not scroll on the main row
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/type/Unit.js: if quantity part is integer, decimals defaults to '0', may be overwritten
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: VariantManagement: "expanded" not announced
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.ToolbarWrapper: Restore focus after applying text color
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.CalendarLegend: Add correct type for translation key

item.title: Version 1.120.30 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.30

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that an error message is displayed when an unbound error occurs on imports in an action group
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m ScrollContainer: unstable QUnit tests are now skipped
    • Type: FIX, Description: DateRangeSelection: Same separator for both date inputs
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've fixed issue where noDataText and noDataDescription was not getting set correctly
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where changes made to the variant management-enabled table were lost when it was refereshed without saving the variant
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the selection parameters passed through the URL are correctly applied in analytical list page applications
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.microchart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the label contrast issue for stacked bar micro chart
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: GroupPanel: Show Field as Column fix
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueListProvider: filterChange event is fired with correct value in case of Single Input and ValueList
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Remove restrictions for text size

item.title: Version 1.120.31 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.31

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the type-ahead suggestions weren't shown when focusing on a field for the first time
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the type-ahead suggestions weren't shown when focusing on a field for the first time
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer trigger a search when unknown parameters are passed
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We no longer trigger a search when unknown parameters are passed
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: Input controls: announced text is now following the guidelines
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus correctly restored
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue where the illustratedMessage provided by a user was being overridden
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month: Improve day re-rendering peformance
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now enabled the screen reader announcement for navigation and action tiles
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.VariantManagement: correct overlap when in text mode
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: Adaptation project now supports modification of the application-level settings in the SAP delivered apps
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the message popover remained open even after the item link was clicked
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed an issue where the Select All checkbox was disabled by introducing a configurable boolean property
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpProvider: Absolute Path is now correctly encoded
    • Type: FIX, Description: ControlFactoryBase: support config enabledMultiSelectionPlugin on value help create
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.calendar.Month: Improve day re-rendering peformance

item.title: Version 1.120.29 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.29

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that duplicate parameters aren't passed to the filter bar
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that back navigation from an object page to another application works correctly
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input, sap.m.ComboBoxBase: Tests on macOS corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.InputBase: Redundant announcement on error state removed
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageView: Navigate to details view when title is too long
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MultiComboBox: Speech output corrected
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: ValueStateMessage with FormattedText displays links twice
    • Type: FIX, Description: Input controls with Suggestions: Value State message in header is no longer focusable
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now improved the field visibility and updated the section title display on the object page
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: creation of instances for date time no longer sets UTC flag to false
    • Type: FIX, Description: comp.FilterBar: Buttons are now visible on 320px screen size
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/IconPool: make mime type match case insensitive
  • Library: sap.ui.generic.app
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the focus is not moved to the last control in cases where an action opens a dialog popup

item.title: Version 1.120.41 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.41

  • Library: sap.gantt
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the zoom level issue for StepwiseZoomStrategy in gantt chart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the parameter ordering mismatch between dependency array and function parameters in ShapeManager for Gantt 1.0

item.title: Version 1.120.34 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.34

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendarGrid: get appointment domref correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: List: Avoid aria-describedby="null"
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartLink: Fix navigation to object page with correct parameters
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.model.json.JSONPropertyBinding.js#checkUpdate: Fix logic to determine whether an update of the DataState has to be done
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxpa.ObjectPageSubSection: Improved key handling
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Improve accessibility behavior

item.title: Version 1.120.35 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.35

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the SAP gateway issues for PDFViewer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: has correct css parameters for active Emphasized
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: The correct ARIA label is now assigned to Object page header forms
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve removed incorrect ARIA labels that were assigned to the footer of an object page
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: remove default sorting on mobile
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpProvider: Validate filters on initial data fetch
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/core/format/NumberFormat.js: support rounding of numbers given as string
    • Type: FIX, Description: routing/History: avoid creating history entry when same hash is applied
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.layout.PaneContainer: fix invalidation of nested panes

item.title: Version 1.120.37 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.120.37

  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.VariantManagement: add aria-expanded & aria-haspopup
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now display tables defined within the com.sap.vocabularies.UI.v1.PresentationVariant annotation in the object page section
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Backslash (\) is no longer duplicated in filter tokens

item.title: Version 1.136.7 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.7

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.FlexibleColumnLayout: prevent animation when initially shown
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: first token is now not truncated when not needed
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Popup: Use activeElement of both light and shadow DOM to determine focus loss
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Avatar: Fix image not visible, when initials are incorrect
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Input: Invisible message is announced correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the SAP gateway issues for PDFViewer
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of tiles not scrolling left or right when buttons are pressed on the slideTile control
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IllustratedMessage: correct CSS variable references
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: prevent calling ensureFilterLoaded on each onBeforeRendering
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartTable: correct metadata retrieval when conditionTypeInfo is used
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterBar: suspend items binding of not visible controls
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/Popup: Use activeElement of both light and shadow DOM to determine focus loss
    • Type: FIX, Description: core/interaction: Cache failed requests to avoid retry attempts
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: Adjust worker initialization
  • Library: sap.ui.richtexteditor
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.richtexteditor.RichTextEditor: Make qUnit tests version specific
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSection: Invalid aria-labelledBy fixed

item.title: Version 1.136.9 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.9

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageTitle: Fix flaky focus test in Safari
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Header visibility issue fixed
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now exclude hidden properties in an analytical table when using the Export feature in split mode
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the setSelectionVariant API works correctly in tables
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with selecting cells in a grid table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the DataFieldForAction label was not translated in an error message
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the DataFieldForAction label was not translated in an error message
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Fix Korean text display within OverflowToolbar
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: Focus issue prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: Add the browser event information to the UI5 event
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.TimePicker: Remove custom shadow overwriting
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Popover: Set shadow style according to the "showArrow" property
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DateTimePicker: fix test about timezone failing in safari
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Select: Correct dropdown width when wrapItemsText enabled
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.DatePicker: close picker on context change
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: Personalization/ColumnsController: column freeze is correctly preserved when comes from variant
    • Type: FIX, Description: ValueHelpDialog: Add Condition button now has correct text and ScreenReader announcement
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: validation for input is now correct and the value state is not overriden when not necessary
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartForm: getConderserInfo method is now handles SmartForm control instance correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: GroupElement's visibility property remains unchanged if its value is bound
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: validation for input is now correct when same invalid value is entered and no error is thrown
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: validation for input is now correct when same invalid value is entered and no error is thrown
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: validation for input is now correct when same invalid value is entered
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartFilterBar: Saving composite keys in the variant is now supported
    • Type: FIX, Description: GroupElement is now hidden when there are no visible children
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Button: Prevent duplicate shortcut announcements in screen readers
    • Type: FIX, Description: ComponentContainer: always propagate propagation listeners
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/thirdparty: bump RequireJS to 2.3.7
  • Library: sap.ui.layout
    • Type: FIX, Description: SemanticFormElement: _updateDisplayText does no longer fail without available _displayField
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Table: Remove renderWhitespace restriction
  • Library: sap.ui.table
    • Type: FIX, Description: Table: Remove renderWhitespace restriction
  • Library: sap.ui.unified
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.unified.Month: removed redundant "selected" announce
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: fix wrapping titles
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Fix wrong positioning
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageSubSection: prevent infinite rerendering loop

item.title: Version 1.136.10 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.10

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Correct header repositioning in both directions
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the busy indicator appears consistently for action parameter dialogs
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now trigger a fetch call to load PDF content and determine PDF availability in the PDFViewer
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SplitContainer: Fixed box-shadow parameter
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where application title and navigation were not consistent when object page was embedded in the My Inbox application
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now configure the settings of related apps using the extension controller
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: FilterController: Selection from ValueHelp in single fields now works correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Improvement of UoM format handling
    • Type: FIX, Description: SVMUI2: Rename delVariant to deleteVariant
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/base/security/sanitizeHTML: Add support for modern CSS display values
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: Field: if ComboBox-Like wrong accessibility info
  • Library: sap.uxap
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.uxap.ObjectPageLayout: Fix wrong title in AnchorBar

item.title: Version 1.136.4 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.4

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the performance of tables that contain a MultiValueField
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that side effects are executed before updating a document in an object page
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue with the performance of tables that contain a MultiValueField
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: List: Avoid aria-describedby="null"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.QuickViewPage: Remove synchronous request during initalization
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Layout issue caused by empty item prevented
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Wizard: aria-labelledby invisible text is set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.IconTabBar: focus outline is fixed for high contrast themes
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: Tokens are properly updated in the n-more list after delete
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Tokenizer: aria-controls attribute is now set correctly
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.NotificationList: Focus handling on item removal is now fixed
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've improved the logic to correctly extract SmartLink metadata for populating the navigation popover's title and description
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now support text-based search for value help in the AI-assisted easy filter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the value help metadata is loaded before the value help dialog opens in the AI-assisted easy filter
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the contact facet displays correctly even when the email field is left empty
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where the object page stopped responding due to incorrect error message handling

    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField: Ensuring flex library is loaded before loading Flex API's
    • Type: FIX, Description: SmartField Guid Type throwns validation error when key property missing in the model

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: Make the experimental new bootstrap the productive one

  • Library: sap.ui.documentation

  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: PropertyHelperUtil: check UI5 2.0 availability by deprecations

item.title: Version 1.136.5 Changes
item.description:

item.title: Version 1.136.8 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.8

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: We’ve resolved an issue where side effects didn’t trigger any messages related to changes made on the subobject page
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly handle errors that occur when creating content in building blocks at runtime
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where links in the Table building block within a custom section did not work correctly in object pages
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that back navigation from an object page to another application works correctly
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.MessageToast: Message positions logic is now updated
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ComboBox: Picker now closes on table scroll
    • Type: FIX, Description: m.VariantManagement: add aria-expanded & aria-haspopup
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.microchart
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the rendering issue of the interactive bar chart while navigating back to list report from an object page
  • Library: sap.ui.comp
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've now fixed the issue of inconsistent decimal digits shown in the smart charts
  • Library: sap.ui.core
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap/ui/model/odata/v2/ODataTreeBinding: $count requests must not contain $expand or $select
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.ui.export: Preserve patterns in template values
  • Library: sap.ui.mdc
    • Type: FIX, Description: SortFlex: Take sortOrder into account for affectedControl during condensing

item.title: Version 1.136.11 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.11

  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We’re introducing the SAP Fiori development portal to offer guidance to developers when creating SAP Fiori elements apps
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now use the default hierarchy qualifier from the service definition if no hierarchyQualifier is defined for a tree table
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly display a key property in the create dialog when the key has a text annotation and doesn't have a Core.Computed annotation
  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that custom fields are added correctly to variants
  • Library: sap.m
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog: Remove redundant announcements from sort and group list items
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.Toolbar: exclude disabled controls from Toolbar navigation
  • Library: sap.suite.ui.generic.template
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue on the analytical list page where navigation failed after selecting a value from value help and pressing Enter
  • Library: sap.ui.export
    • Type: FIX, Description: ExportDialog: Apply file type only with actual type change

item.title: Version 1.136.12 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.12

item.title: Version 1.136.13 Changes
item.description:

item.title: Version 1.136.6 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.136.6

item.title: Version 1.139.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.139.1

item.title: Version 1.142.0 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.142.0

  • Library: sap.f
    • Type: FIX, Description: CardHeader: headers inherit binding path from "sap.card"
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPageTitle: Fix flaky focus test in Safari
    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.f.DynamicPage: Layout issue prevented
  • Library: sap.fe.ariba
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the colorPalette property in the Status building block
  • Library: sap.fe.controls
    • Type: FIX, Description: New text from SAPUI5 Fiori Elements
  • Library: sap.fe.core
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use separators for grouped actions
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now determine the table type based on the service definition
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide the preferredAction startup parameter to automatically trigger the SmartSummary action on the object page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now use the OperationAvailable annotation to check if a user has the required permission to edit a collaborative draft
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now terminate ABAP draft sessions when users move away from the draft
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the colorPalette property in the Status building block
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now provide an API on the Table building block to select contexts or clear the selection
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use semantically connected fields in tables

item.title: Version 1.142.1 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.142.1

    • Type: FIX, Description: We now trigger a fetch call to load PDF content and determine PDF availability in the PDFViewer

    • Type: FIX, Description: sap.m.SearchField: Fix Korean text display within OverflowToolbar

item.title: Version 1.142.3 Changes
item.description:
Changes in Version 1.142.3

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where multiple dropdown rows were created because of too many data requests
    • Type: FIX, Description: We have resolved an issue where horizontal scrollbars did not render correctly in tables after exiting full-screen mode
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that fields that share the same value help collection can have different values in action parameter dialogs
  • Library: sap.fe.templates
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Create action works correctly when inline edit is enabled in a list report page

    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now enable lazy loading for the entire application
    • Type: FIX, Description: We've resolved an issue where grid tables were incorrectly displayed in tab mode

  • Library: sap.fe.ina

  • Library: sap.fe.macros
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now enable the save and leave feature to allow users to save an object page and navigate back to the list report page
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: We now support pasting content into table columns using the Text_Only text arrangement
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use the `subSectionCreated` parameter to trigger a callback function when a subsection is created for the first time
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now use inclusive semantic date ranges, such as 'Last X Months to Date' and 'Next X Months to Date'
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now enable lazy loading for the entire application
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now correctly resolve action parameter values when the Common.Text annotation points to a property with the same name
    • Type: FIX, Description: You can now set menu items defined using DataActionForGroup to be navigable
    • Type: FIX, Description: We now ensure that the Enabled property of actions is bound correctly for grouped table actions in custom sections

  • Library: sap.fe.plugins.managecache
    • Type: FEATURE, Description: You can now enable lazy loading for the entire application
